about_the_game: The demo for Office Nightmare contains the first 3 levels of the game, as well as a brief tutorial level. You'll be able to try an assortment of the many weapons from the full game, as well as many of the Manager's different tasks to which you'll be assigned. Rescue coworkers, set zombies on fire, and deliver pizza!

content_descriptors.notes: Zombies are frequently "killed", often in a rather explosive manner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Work sucks, and then you die... and apparently become a zombie. A fast-paced third person shooter with some unconventional weapons.
